profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.
warranty_terms: Yes. 6 Months on Workmanship.  Kindly ask for more details.

Sanli Construction is basement renovation at its best. Our job is to turn your bare basement into a cozy, luxurious living space. With over 200 basements under our belt, we are rich in experience and maintain the highest standards. 

We are truly a one-stop shop for all your needs. Our services include building new kitchen and bathroom or renovating the old, wall partition, wall removal, bedroom building, bar, drywall, painting, electrical work, plumbing, fireplace, floor, insulation, staircase, windows, doors, and side entrance. profile:
Welcome to Simply Exquisite, we are a construction and renovations general contractor in Toronto, serving the GTA and surrounding areas.

For over 20 years we have worked with property and homeowners providing them with high caliber commercial and home renovation services. We have earned our reputation as one of the best general contractors in the GTA through our trade expertise and professionalism. We are customer-service driven, pay extra attention to details, and deliver a quality product, on time and budget.

We approach every project with this simply promise: Every home renovation, general contracting, and construction project will be Simply Exquisite. That is our guarantee.

Whether you are looking to do a home renovation in Toronto, from kitchen design and renovations, to bathroom remodels and basement finishing, or something smaller like having your kitchen refaced or installing basement heated flooring, you can trust the best construction company in Toronto to give you the peace of mind of a job well done.

We offer award-winning renovation services that come with a 5-year warranty. We provide in-house design services and counseling, free of charge, with a licensed architectural designer. We extend this added value with every one of our projects so that you can be sure that your project will satisfy your needs.

profile:
TAVAN MADAR INC (TM Design and construction group) is a trusted greater Toronto area contracting company. We specialize in renovation for your home and business office. Our range of services will help improve the look and functionally of your property, with numerous years of experience you can reply on TAVAN MADAR (TM design and construction group) to handle your renovations.

Our team members have many years of combined experience and have provide us with the skill to transform outdate, aging home into beautiful space that fit each home owner’s individual needs with absolute precision.

In a large and popular city like Toronto, major renovation in your home can be a serious headache. This means that even choosing a company specializing in home renovations is difficult. However, we will make your choice significantly easier with our promise to take care of every step in the process. As a full-service design build firm, TM design and construction group is proud to present our comprehensive set of steps, as follows:

- We obtain all necessary permits, set budgets that you are comfortable with, and clearly explain the renovation/restoration process.
- We communicate your need and preferences to our team of architects, designers, project managers, and carpenters during all phases of the project.
- We went to be absolutely sure that you are happy with the end result.
- We complete drawings, architectural and interior designs, as well as house lifting additions and foundation underpinning.

Overall, we make the revitalization process as seamless as possible in fact we went you to have fun!
Check out our portfolio of past renovations for an idea of what our team can do for your home.

If you are interested in performing major renovations in Toronto, please do not hesitate to contact us, simply call or email us to book your free, in-home consultation.

profile:
Summitcrest Group approaches each project with a structured process that is driven by a strong commitment to transparency, knowledge and collaboration. A process designed to instill trust, confidence and ensure quality.
***
In the initial phase of the project we will meet with our clients to discuss their expectations, timelines and budget. We carefully examine the scope of the project to identify and challenges that may impact timelines, budget and work.  We have over 40 years experience. 
***
Once the work is underway we communicate with our clients regularly to discuss the status of the project and address and concerns or thoughts they may have along the way.
At the completion of the project, we will meet with our clients again to address and deficiencies that may require attention. 
***
Our goal is to ensure a successful and stress free renovation project that is delivered with quality workmanship.

At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.

profile:
As an innovative, creative new home builder, JII FINE HOMES has redefined the experience of luxury home living for families who dream only the best. The company’s President, Jim has been actively involved for 20 years in all facets of marketing residential, multi-residential and commercial properties. Noting a lack of high-quality homes being built for discerning clients who wanted something above the ordinary, Jim has raised the bar when it comes to the creation of custom-designed luxury residences exuding architectural excellence and inspiring, spacious interiors.

JII Home Improvement is committed to creating your dream home. From something cozy, economic, and yet good looking with luxurious qualities to two story houses and large mansions, we will build it for you. Our teams of reputable builders and craftsmen turn your dream home to a reality. A place to build and have good memories for generations! We know what you need to obtain a building permit for your property. Our knowledge and know how will ensure your peace of mind.

For clients who already own a property but have not begun the design process, JII can help you design your dream home. Distinctive architectural plans, each with leading edge technologies and exquisite features are synonymous with JII FINE HOMES. 

Trust JII to build your next home or major renovation. JII renovations and additions can include architectural and interior design, obtaining all municipal approvals and scheduling contractors and trades to ensure a seamless transformation from old to new.

profile:
Haus Renovation Group is a team of licensed and insured professionals with years of experience under their belt operating in the Greater Toronto Area and the nearby municipalities. 

As a company that prioritizes client satisfaction we do not shy away from honest conversations regarding the work to be done. You should never expect to see costs not discussed prior to the start of a project. At the same time however, we stay flexible for any adjustments you may choose to make. Unlike our competition, we do not rely on unnecessarily complex communication mechanisms that leave the client unheard for days. Your project will have direct involvement of the owner that is more than willing to guide you through the evolution of your home. 

At Haus Renovation Group certain things are important above all. Safety is of utmost importance and cannot be compromised putting you or any of our workers in physical danger. We follow every occupational health and safety protocols on job sites to insure your project gets completed accident free throughout all the stages of development and execution.

profile:
At First Canadian Construction Corp, we specialize in creating complete customized home renovation solutions. Whether it’s your investment project or it’s your family home, after a free initial consultation and space analysis, our designers will present you with a set of options customized to fit your needs and budget. 
We cover everything from design to installation, and every single phase of the project is supervised to ensure it stays on schedule and meets our standard of excellence.
If you’re looking for a complete home remodel or just partial renovation, count on us for professional services. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remodeling for Home Owners
You are updating your house into something new to meet your family's requirements or changing the layout and use of a space to increase your overall space function, or you are just restoring your home to good condition and making the look new again with some cosmetic upgrades, we help you achieve your goal within your planned budget.
We start with a meeting to hear about your requirements and your goals. Then we show you our previous works and our process, detailing all the steps we are going to take to make this project easy and enjoyable for you and your family.
After conducting a house survey, we will provide you with some designs options and associate budget.
During the process, we are with you all through the project to make sure you are kept up to date on all activities and that you and your family's concerns are in the forefront.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remodeling for Investors:

If you are an investor who carefully choose and owns your own investment properties and you are planning to remodel or renovate to increase the value and earn the profit, we will be focused on those details that will result in the most value for the least amount of effort and cost.
Part of the process includes a market and neighborhood analysis, paying close attention to the other homes in the neighborhood to avoid over-improving the property or spending budget and effort on the spaces that doesn’t boost the value.

******

Our team of real estate professionals will survey the neighborhood and its potential to architect your remodeling approach and define a plan to maximize the investment profit.
This remolding plan is focused on increasing profit for our investors and not ours. We take benefit from our long lasting relationships.

******
Once our market analysis for your property is complete, you will be provided with our recommendations, the layout changes and any required upgrades including choosing right finishes for each room. All the details will be fully documented for your review and approval.

profile:
BRIKS (Verb/ Noun/ Adjective): Bespoke. The Art of Luxury, Redefined.

BRIKS Design-Build Group is a TARION Registered Boutique Firm, specializing in Luxury New Build Construction of Custom Residences. We offer a Full range of the Best-in-Class General Contracting Services, including Transitional Renovation and Remodeling, Kitchen Designs, and Interior Design for Residential and Commercial Clients throughout Toronto.

The construction of your home may well be the largest investment you ever make, and is a huge undertaking. Simply put, this is not the type of job in which you can leave anything to chance. When you work with BRIKS Design & Build for your new and remodeling construction projects in the G.T.A., nothing will be overlooked. 
With our experienced team of renowned Architects, Interior Designers, Engineers, and Sub- Trades; we assure you that every detail of the construction project, from initial designs to site plans, and from construction to the materials sourced and used; will only be of the highest level of caliber that we work with. Whatever your vision of your new home may entail, our bespoke BRIKS team will ensure that it is fully realized.
As a leading Design-Build Firm in the G.T.A. , not only do we provide detailed site and architectural plans from some of the most reputable Architects in Canada, but we also assist with every part of the building process. From applying for permits, to laying the foundation, to your BRIKS Pre-Delivery Inspection; we are truly your one-stop shop for all your construction needs. 
Over the last 20+ years, we’ve earned the trust of residents throughout the G.T.A. region, and we would love an opportunity to earn your trust and business.

profile:
Reno-Art House Improvements offers quality renovations and remodeling. We specialize in complete  renovation including custom Homes, kitchen with load bearing walls removal, custom kitchen cabinetry, custom vanities and other cabinetry, creating opening or open concept, basement and over house renovations. All services are completed with incredible speed without affecting the quality of the finish product. Check our website at www.reno-art.ca. Our 15+ years of construction and renovation experience was brought from Europe in 2005, since that we successfully work to combine European quality with Canadian standards. 

***

We have managed to combine speed and quality services for competitive price and great quality. We are using quality materials suitable for each project for the best results. We perform the work ourselves, which allows us to have    competitive prices, and carry Civil Engineer degree that guaranty professional and quality work. 
We are a fully insured company located in Woodbridge with a wide range of experience. Our main serving areas are: Woodbridge, North York, Toronto, Markham, and all over the GTA area.

profile:
Our job at High Class Renovation is to take your vision and make it a reality. We start by listening to your vision about your project and once we have a clear picture we begin to create the design for your renovation. Our goal is to ensure that everything is to your expectations. When it’s time to start your project, we go to work and complete the renovations just as we discussed, on time and within budget.

High Class Renovation is Barrie and surrounding Area’s leading home renovations service. We have 20 years of experience completing home and commercial renovation projects of all sizes. During that time of making our clients’ renovation visions a reality, we have worked in a variety of settings and installed hundreds of thousands of square feet of ceramic, porcelain and marble tile in custom houses, condos and new subdivisions.

profile:
NO PROJECT TOO BIG OR TOO SMALL
Our main focus with small or large scale construction projects is to develop a clear understanding of your individual needs & budget. 
No matter how small or big your project is, we will strive to find a solution for your budget!

10 Years of Experience
If you’re looking for a friendly, fast, and affordable residential renovation company, MONTEMAYOR GC  has everything you need. 
As a locally owned business, we understand the unique needs and expenses that are associated with homeownership. 
We’re homeowners ourselves and we want you to be happy with our services. 
Our team of professionals has the necessary experience, equipment, and attitude to get the job done right—every time!

Our Mission
Here Montemayor GC we perform the highest level of quality service at fair prices and ensure complete customer satisfaction. 
We deliver professionalism, integrity and honesty with every job we take on.

We have maintained and continue to develop trusting relationships with our suppliers and customers. 
We strive to always provide an efficient service that will increase the lifespan of your walls and furnishings so that you, your family and friends can enjoy the living space you have always wanted. 

We only use the most advanced materials. You can rest assured that all jobs are handled with care; whether big or small.
To us, all restoration and renovation projects are important, and we strive to provide results that exceed your expectations.

Give us a call - 647-202-7085

profile:
We are a home renovation, remodel, and handyman services company. 

With over a decade of experience, we offer quality workmanship and attention to detail that fits any budget. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and customization of work for each project we undertake. Whether your project is indoors, outdoors, a small fix or a large-scale renovation, we are able to meet your need. 

BATHROOMS
Whether you are looking for luxury finishes or something simple and functional, we've got you covered. 

FLOORING
Vinyl and laminate floors are on the rise, as they are durable, versatile, and come in a variety of attractive colours, shades and textures. We also install hardwood floors and tiles.

DECKS
Have us build you a new deck or simply refurbish your existing deck.

OUTDOOR WORK
Let us revitalize your outdoor space! Whether its a new shed, a rock garden, pavers, stone features, or mulch and sod installation, we've got you covered. 

STORAGE SOLUTIONS
We'll help you create more storage space so you can better utilize your cold room/cantina, basement, garage, and shed. We can also convert your extra bedroom into a large walk-in closet. 

GENERAL HANDYMAN REPAIRS & MAINTENANCE
Drywall repairs, painting, staining, electrical fixture replacements, trim carpentry installations, and other home repair needs.

profile:
Welcome to the home of Toronto's oldest condominium refurbishment contractor (founded in 1972), 

Request a complimentary (non-pushy, value-focused) personal consultation to explore possibility around your upcoming refurbishment project by calling (905) 944-1385 during business hours, or completing the form on this page.

During your complimentary refurbishment consultation, we’ll help you with some of the more important elements of your planning, design and build process, including:

✓ Durable material options.
✓ Efficient project workflows.
✓ Budget saving opportunities.
✓ Approximate timelines.
✓ Common mistakes to avoid.
✓ Best practices for minimal disruptions.

And more!

Need a Build Quote?
If you've already got a world-class design ready to go and are looking for a quote to bring it to life, let's talk details and get you some numbers.

profile:
At House and Homes Contracting, we see an unfinished basement as unfinished business. Enter our team — certified home building professionals who specialize in remodeling and repairing commercial and residential basements of all sizes, styles and configurations. Let us take care of your renovation or construction. If required, we have the tools to finance project of any size and budget.

House & Homes Contracting was founded in 2001 by Carlous Smith. Based in Toronto, Ontario the company provides residential and commercial renovations throughout the Greater Toronto & surrounding areas.

Unique to the industry, House & Homes Contracting provides quality and efficiency with a slogan stating we do it right, the right way.. This belief and slogan was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. Included with our services is a complementary follow-up visit one year after the completion of all projects.

profile:
Our goal is to provide our customers with the best possible value for the least amount of money while exceeding your expectations. We offer a complete package of quality services geared towards your renovation needs.

These include: Custom Homes, Commercial Projects, Exterior Building Restorations, Renovations, Bathroom & Kitchen Renovations, Carpentry, Plumbing, Stucco, Additions, Finished Basements, New Offices/Apartments, Electrical and many other services.

Ravineview Construction is an Ontario based renovation contractor. We provide state of the art equipment, high quality materials, skilled labor, worker’s compensation and general liability insurance and qualified supervision of our crews. Our staff pays particular attention to detail, communicates daily with project managers and is courteous to your residents needs.

Our company strives to provide our clients with superior construction and design expertise, and to create a positive building experience. We believe that continuous communication ensures that clients are fully informed every step of the way. Our expert staff is able to manage every aspect of a client’s home improvement project including plumbing, electrical and mechanical. Clients can rely on our team’s knowledge and experience in meeting deadlines, and production and quality craftsmanship. Our clients’ satisfaction is our utmost priority.

We believe in operating a renovation company with honesty and integrity, so that clients refer us to their friends and families. We believe in providing the best, efficient service possible, providing the highest quality of work in a reasonable and affordable price. If you’re thinking of bathroom renovation, kitchen renovation or any other type of renovation project you do not need to look any further. We pride to be at the top of the Toronto’s finest renovation companies.

profile:
ABOUT SHANDYMAN CONTRACTING

ShandyMan Contracting is one of Toronto's most trusted General Contractors, specializing in Roofing, Painting and Carpentry & Renovations.

Whether it be a commercial or residential design or repair, The ShandyMan Team prides themselves on their results and happy customers.

CORE VALUES

PEOPLE
This core value runs deep in the Shand family - passed down from Shane’s father who worked very hard to leave a legacy worth following. You can see it on the faces of friends, family, employees and customers of ShandyMan Contracting Inc. Love and leadership is at the centre of this organization.

PASSION
One has to be passionate about their craft in order to be successful in this business - it can be tough and the work isn’t always pretty. For anyone who’s ever worked with "The ShandyMan", the first thing you’ll notice is his passion for life, family and work. Passion is wildly reflected in ShandyMan Contracting’s long lasting relationships and successful projects across the Greater Toronto Area.

PURPOSE
Founder, Shane Shand truly believes in living a life of purpose and meaning. ShandyMan Contracting provides that opportunity for its employees through the example Shane and his team have been setting from an early age. Growing up in Toronto’s Beaches, and learning from his father, he now brings over 20 years of experience as a General Contractor with key specialities. Shane is now able to live out his own dream through the art of enhancing commercial and residential properties.

SHANE SHAND
FOUNDER & PRESIDENT

THE SHANDYMAN STORY
MEET OUR FOUNDER & PRESIDENT SHANE SHAND THE "SHANDYMAN"
Born and raised in Toronto's Beaches Community, Shane and his team bring over 20 years of experience in residential and commercial General Contracting. ShandyMan Contracting services a variety of clients across the Greater Toronto Area and beyond. Specialties include; roofing, painting and carpentry. ShandyMan's mission, vision and core values are the guide to transforming your space.

EVERY DAY IS A BLESSED DAY.

profile:
AMARIS GROUP INC.
Our main priority is to provide our clients with the highest quality of work, yet at the best price possible. We bring an insider’s knowledge of costs and an excellent employees and professional trades to deliver consistently competitive pricing on a variety of projects. Our creative thinking on alternatives and options to stay within budget and at the same time say ahead of the competition in terms of quality of the structure.
CONSTRUCTION & RENOVATION
We can come and take measurement of your project and prepare complete "permit ready" drawing (from scratch) Showing the changes that you are planning to make. Drawing that we prepare would include all architectural structural and building code. Related specifications needed Amaris Group as well will take care of applying for and obtain a building permit for your project.
Once the designer and architect have conceptualized and planned your dream home renovation, Remodeling, walls removal and structural works, the Project Manager selects the appropriate professional employees and trades to start your project exactly to spec and, of course, to the highest quality.
1. Renovation & Remodeling
2. walls removals, structural works
We work to bring exceptional customer service that guarantees your satisfaction. You can depend on our professional employees and trades that will provide you with a right solution to solve any problems. We are dedicated to your satisfaction and get the job done right. Your safety comes first - we care about your safety, comfort and peace of mind and We value "Quality work" and our goal is to bring comfort to your home and ultimately your family. We specialize in Construction, Renovation, Remodeling, and structural works like steel beams, or LVL beams removal and installation. Our knowledgeable professional employees and trades team is fully prepared to help you with any issues and inquiries regarding your project. 
In case of an emergency Amaris Group Inc. is always available to help you to bring Your satisfaction. 
Give us a call and our team will be there to help you out today!
1. Renovation & Remodeling
2. structural works (steel beams, or LVL beams removal and installation)
(416) 666-1440

PLT Flooring is one of the most competitive companies in the GTA in terms of quality and prices. We are unique, as we work solely on a Shop at Home basis read more This way, we maximize our savings that are then passed on to our customers. 

We are specialized in installation and refinishing of hardwood floors and stairs.   Also we provide professional and custom renovation Services for all your inside remodeling projects, including basement, kitchen, bathroom and all areas of your house. And we’ll make it happen at a price you’ll love too.
services:

profile:
The history of NDG Group dates back to 2005 when it was founded in Georgia by Archil Tabatadze. Archil Tabatadze has a master’s degree in construction management. Despite all obstacles and high competition, NDG Group has been maintaining its professional image and high quality of service, as well as the philosophy that comes with it. Due to our dedication to these values, the company showed up in the Canadian Market in 2015. Today, NDG represents a fully bonded and insured General Contracting Company.
Meeting existing challenges and with the obtained professional experience, Archil made a decision to create a professional team that offers top quality customer service.
The principles NDG Group is based on are very simple, one project – one team. We are not hiring sub-contractors. We are building a future by ourselves.
NDG Group does not want to speak in general terms or use empty expressions. We are offering you our model of work performance insuring our professional image and competition advantages.
The Company is divided into teams, with each group being represented by a minimum of two professionals. Each team is equipped with present-day tools, and have the needed professional experience, personal qualities and great commitment to their work.

At Canada Home Insulation we are here to help every step of the way. From arranging necessary personnel for each step. For example, booking the Certified Energy Advisor to following up for your rebate claim.

profile: HomeReno Direct is one of the most trusted home renovation experts in the Mississauga and surrounding area. We are a family owned business with over 50 years of combined experience. We are a one stop shop, offering you a full turn key service from concept to completion which includes but is not limited to: design, engineering, plans, permit application and renovations. We specialize in Basements, Bathrooms, Kitchens and home Additions. Guaranteed Work: We offer a 2 yr guarantee. Fixed Pricing: You will receive a detailed quotation. Insurance: We carry a $5 million liability insurance policy. Design: Receive a complimentary design for your dream project. Selections: Our purchase allowance model allows you to pick whatever products you like. Quality: We take pride in every renovation Dedicated Project Manger, who will work closely on your renovations. Financing: we will help you with your financing needs. Financing is based on OAC. Visit our website, www.homerenodirect.com or Showroom!

profile:
Phinesse Construction Group specializes in five unique groups of service areas which are Kitchens, Bathrooms, Basements, Accessibility and Assembly. 

Our motto is to " Make your home right for you." We are competitively priced and have the knowledge to create your vision you dream of and if you like offer advice to bring your dreams to reality. Our company is built on the principle of trust, respect and finesse. 
We use state of the art technology to keep track of all projects, this allows wide open visible communication between you and our team. 

Our team creates a project schedule and gives clients their own portal login to be able to track job progress, request changes and make progress payments, if applicable. 
Our trained professionals and experienced subcontractors are not only vetted for their expertise in their trade but also for mannerism and client relations. As we believe you the client is always right. 
We stand by our workmanship with a two-year warranty

profile:
Fixall Restoration is a locally owned and operated disaster restoration company located in Etobicoke. Although our office is in Etobicoke, our restoration professionals operate in all Greater Toronto Area, including Vaughan,  Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, etc.

We clean and restore properties damaged from flood, fire, smoke, mold. Our team is certified and licensed in the emergency restoration field.

We also have lots of experience in the restoration field in houses and businesses all around GTA and northern Ontario.

Our responsibility is to inform and communicate with you about all cleaning and restoration procedures we follow. Also we are here to answer any other questions you might have for us. We offer restoration services 24/7 according to your needs.

Fernbrook Homes
WE BELIEVE THAT TAKING CARE OF OUR CUSTOMERS IS OUR FIRST AND MOST IMPORTANT PRIORITY
At Fernbrook Homes we believe that taking care of our customers is our first and most important priority. From the moment you walk into one of our sales centres, to long after you've moved into your new home, we take care of you. We take care to ensure our home designs are as cutting edge as possible, customizing plans when necessary to better suit a family's individual needs and desires. We take care to ensure we build your home with the highest quality materials and workmanship techniques to last a lifetime. And most importantly, we take care to ensure you're completely satisfied with your new home purchase. Over the last three decades, we've taken good care of thousands of homeowners in dozens of our signature communities. Come visit one of our fine communities today and see how we can take care of you.

profile:
Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.

profile:
R&M Construction, founded in 1976 (incorporated in 1983), is a family owned and operated general contracting company based out of Acton, Ontario. We specialize in the construction and restoration of natural waterways including eroded banks and shorelines. Our goal is to restore the environment to the way it was originally created, protect infrastructure, and improve habitat in an efficient and cost effective manner while minimizing negative effects.

​

Projects include channel improvements, Storm Water Management (SWM) pond retro-fitting and creation, as well as protection of streams, wetlands, and shorelines, and the construction of soil erosion protection zones through bank stabilization. Our projects implement the latest in bio-engineering and fluvial geomorphologic designs to ensure they are completed to the highest standard and are ecologically stable. In addition to waterway restoration, we have also had the opportunity to rehabilitate and create parklands through the construction of trails, boardwalks, and pedestrian bridges.

​

Our team has extensive experience and expertise in the field, and are able to complete projects in highly sensitive and difficult to access areas.  We own a fleet of specialized equipment which has been outfitted specifically for this type of work as we continue to develop new and innovative methods. We have a team of construction professionals with years of experience in naturalized planting, waterway restoration, and impact minimization.

​

We have collaborated on projects with conservation authorities, municipalities, ministries, and private owners to ensure that shoreline protection and stream repairs are done professionally and quickly with as little environmental impact as possible.

​

Safety is a priority to us - we are continually reviewing our processes and policies while implementing new methods to ensure we are operating as safe as possible. We are COR Certified and have an active account with ISNetworld & Avetta. We are fully insured and bonded.

profile:
Established in 2004, 51 Construction Ltd. has devoted to providing the highest, safest, most professional and customized construction and renovation services for our clients. With our skillful and experienced workers, supportive and innovative designers and engineers, and good customer relationship team, we have taken pride in serving our clients with the higher quality services, ranging from full-service residential and commercial general contracting, interior buildouts, design-build construction, to remodeling and renovating services, throughout the Greater Toronto Area. 51 Construction has earned a reputation for the quality of work, integrity, and professionalism since its inception.

To better build and renovate homes and offices for our clients, 51 Construction has established its own wood manufacturing plant in uniquely, flawlessly, and professionally designing, producing, installing both residential and commercial cabinets, countertops, reception desk, office cabinetry projects in Ontario. In collaboration with our subsidiaries, affiliates, and partners, we have successfully built our presence in the industry locally and nationally. 

Check out our Cabinetry Website - www.51wood.ca
Check out our Construction Website - www.51builder.com

Give us a call - 416-292-9788, or email - helena@51builder.com

profile:
R&M Construction, founded in 1976 (incorporated in 1983), is a family owned and operated general contracting company based out of Acton, Ontario. We specialize in the construction and restoration of natural waterways including eroded banks and shorelines. Our goal is to restore the environment to the way it was originally created, protect infrastructure, and improve habitat in an efficient and cost effective manner while minimizing negative effects.

​

Projects include channel improvements, Storm Water Management (SWM) pond retro-fitting and creation, as well as protection of streams, wetlands, and shorelines, and the construction of soil erosion protection zones through bank stabilization. Our projects implement the latest in bio-engineering and fluvial geomorphologic designs to ensure they are completed to the highest standard and are ecologically stable. In addition to waterway restoration, we have also had the opportunity to rehabilitate and create parklands through the construction of trails, boardwalks, and pedestrian bridges.

​

Our team has extensive experience and expertise in the field, and are able to complete projects in highly sensitive and difficult to access areas.  We own a fleet of specialized equipment which has been outfitted specifically for this type of work as we continue to develop new and innovative methods. We have a team of construction professionals with years of experience in naturalized planting, waterway restoration, and impact minimization.

​

We have collaborated on projects with conservation authorities, municipalities, ministries, and private owners to ensure that shoreline protection and stream repairs are done professionally and quickly with as little environmental impact as possible.

​

Safety is a priority to us - we are continually reviewing our processes and policies while implementing new methods to ensure we are operating as safe as possible. We are COR Certified and have an active account with ISNetworld & Avetta. We are fully insured and bonded.
